 2023-08362023-08-17JUS
ActOther Than Statutory Authority
PrecisReappointment of the HONOURABLE DAVID C. HARRIS, as a member of the Independent Judicial Advisory Committee for the Province of British Columbia, to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Reappointment of the HONOURABLE DAVID C. HARRIS, as a member of the Independent Judicial Advisory Committee for the Province of British Columbia, to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years.
